Row.Text: Project required for expanded culture victory. #1 of 3. Upon completion also grants the following effects:[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+3 Appeal in all cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Double points towards [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writers, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artists, and [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musicians.
You've completed a project required for expanded culture victory.

Project required for expanded culture victory. #2 of 3. Upon completion also grants the following effects:[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 Movement to all units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]All units ignore zones of control.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Rock bands are half price.

Project required for expanded culture victory. #3 of 3. Upon completion also grants the following effects:[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_Power] Power in all cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Archaeologists are half price to purchase.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Triple [ICON_Tourism] tourism from [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] artifacts.

To achieve a [COLOR:ResCultureLabelCS]CULTURE[ENDCOLOR] victory, you must become [COLOR:ResCultureLabelCS]CULTURALLY DOMINANT[ENDCOLOR] over all other civilizations. Cultural dominance occurs when you attract more [COLOR:ResCultureLabelCS]VISITING TOURISTS[ENDCOLOR] to your civilization than the other civilization has [COLOR:ResCultureLabelCS]DOMESTIC TOURISTS[ENDCOLOR] at home.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Generating high amounts of [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Tourism] Tourism increases both your domestic tourists and visiting tourists from other civilizations. You must also complete 3 theater square projects unlocked by future era civics.
You've completed Fight For Form, a project required for expanded culture victory. #1 of 3.
You've completed Give Peace A Chance, a project required for expanded culture victory. #2 of 3.
You've completed Knowledge Is Power, a project required for expanded culture victory. #3 of 3.
Fight For Form completed first in world.
You've completed Fight For Form, a project required for expanded culture victory. No one else has managed this. #1 of 3.
Give Peace A Chance completed first
Give Peace A Chance completed first in world.
You've completed Give Peace A Chance, a project required for expanded culture victory. No one else has managed this. #2 of 3.
Knowledge Is Power completed first in world.
You've completed Knowledge Is Power, a project required for expanded culture victory. No one else has managed this. #3 of 3.

{1_CivName} only needs their culture to become dominant over one more player to achieve total cultural dominance. Once they have accomplished this and the three cultural projects they will achieve a Culture Victory.
{1_CivName} completes a culture project and moves closer to victory.
An unmet civilization completes a culture project and moves closer to victory.
